<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hurling Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2095) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 198 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81)

**Prerequisites**
[Viking Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2094)

</column>

---

You make a ranged Strike with a [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) weapon you already have in your hand, Stride, and then Interact to draw another weapon. If you are raging, you can add the additional damage with melee weapons you receive from raging to your damage with the thrown weapon.
name: Hurling Charge
